mapper.select: SELECT m.*, d.dpt_name, p.pt_name, p.pt_order FROM member m, department d, position p WHERE m_id = #{m_id} AND m.dpt_code = d.dpt_code(+) AND m.pt_code = p.pt_code(+)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (m_id, m_password, m_name, m_empnum, m_birth, m_phone, m_email, m_status) VALUES (#{m_id}, #{m_password}, #{m_name}, #{m_empnum}, #{m_birth}, #{m_phone}, #{m_email}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT at_id FROM MEMBER_AUTHORITIES WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET m_lastdate = SYSDATE WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: UPDATE member SET m_photo = #{m_photo} WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
